hero.ntitle: Hire Excellent Cuban Freelancers Services For Your Business.
hero.nsubtitle: Freemance is an online platform where you can see the profile of professionals from different fields, connected with Slyk this allows hiring
hero.nsubtitlemobile: Hire professionals now for your business in the Fremance directory

cardcont.1text: Get ready to sell your skills to different contractors using Slyk
cardcont.2text: Work from home, or strict time limitations, totally remote
cardcont.3text: Get more visibility in the job market, have contractors discover your profile
cardcont.4text: FOR NOW, the client can contact you through the email you provide when setting up your profile

applayout.descsection1: Find now with professionals from all fields, and hire them for dedicated jobs, pay from Slyk and contact them.
applayout.descsection3: These are some of the most prominent profiles on the platform currently.

faq.answer1: Freemance is a platform associated with Slyk whose main objective is to give visibility to Cuban freelancers towards the international labor market, all payments are made through the slyk platform as well as the view of the freemancer's catalog, this platform works as a directory that you access if you want to have more visibility or find freelancers more easily.
